short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The coolest new tab extension which will tell you how much time is left in year, month, week and day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The coolest new tab extension which will let you know how much time is left in year, month, week or day. It will keep motivate you to do things as time is passing out.

Stay Motivated
